title: Kiss Man Man Medium Light Skin Tone Medium Skin Tone
description: Represents a romantic kiss between two men, with specific skin tone variations. It conveys love, affection, and partnership.
apple_vendor_description: This depiction of two men sharing a kiss, with medium-light and medium skin tones respectively, is rendered with Apple’s characteristic warmth and gentle realism.  On Apple devices, their faces are softly shaded, with subtle blush tones and glossy highlights that convey affection and intimacy. The smooth gradients and rounded edges contribute to a tender and loving portrayal, making this emoji a beautiful representation of romantic connection.
